item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

lol

  1. for where they start

1.go to player.java
2.search // initial x and y coordinates of the player
you should see something like // initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 2517; // 3365; teleportToY = 3365; // 3511;

the teleportToX is the x and y coords of where they start

what they wear

search // Giving the player an unique look in player.java

you should see something like

playerEquipment[playerHat] = 6858; playerEquipment[playerCape] = 6568; playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = 6859; playerEquipment[playerChest] = 5575; playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1; playerEquipment[playerLegs] = 5576; playerEquipment[playerHands] = 2997; playerEquipment[playerFeet] = 7114; playerEquipment[playerRing] = -1; playerEquipment[playerArrows] = -1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 6528;

the = 6528 is the id for the thing they wear

Read full topic
